extendedInfo.description: Citybotâs San Diego Smart Travel Guide creates personalized itineraries for visitors both familiar and new to San Diego, California. This free app provides automated itineraries based on your interests and schedule, suggesting what to do in San Diego.Key Features-Tailored Itineraries:Simply tell Citybot what type of activities interest you and in a matter of seconds receive a personalized schedule. From a local favorite cafe in the Gaslamp, followed by a trip to the San Diego Zoo, ending with dinner in a well priced 3 star restaurant in Little Italy.Smart Planning:Never worry about trying to determine the best way to get from place to place or if your next stop is open. Citybot will suggest how to get to your destination and when you should arrive.Peer Recommendations:Citybot has asked both locals and visitors, and will only share activities that get the best ratings and recommendations. We have collected data from dozens of sites so you can know the best places in Hillcrest, the Gaslamp, La Jolla, and beyond.Citybot wants you to get the most out of your visit :)Have questions or comments? Send them to feedback@citybot.com and we will write back in 24 hours.

reviews.title: Useful for San Diego Natives!
reviews.comment: Despite growing up in San Diego this app brought me to amazing places that I didn\'t even know existed. Whether you are visiting or have been living in San Diego for the past 50 years this app is incredibly useful.
reviews.author: Anthony Attard

reviews.title: Most useful travel planning app out there!!!
reviews.comment: Great app all around. Instead of just helping me pick one good activity like most apps, this one helps me string together a full day of things to do.  It factors in what kinds of things I like / want to do (i.e. museums, bars, parks, restaurants), where I am starting and ending my day, how close things are together and their open hours, etc. The app then matches up all that up with user ratings and gives you a full itinerary of activities, personalize just for you.  You can then edit the itinerary once you\'
reviews.author: Jon Belmonte

reviews.title: awesome app!
reviews.comment: Brilliant creation! Especially for those of us who deeply value efficiency, this app is amazing!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Guarantee a great trip to San Diego
reviews.comment: Very useful way to make the most of a trip to San Diego. App lets you pick what you know you want to see and suggests other destinations for you, then lays out a plan that puts everything in the best order with appropriate time at each destination and travel time in-between. Tripadvisor, Yelp and Facebook reviews are included in the profiles of each destination (and there a a wide variety of them) so it saves a lot of research time deciding where you want to go. You can customize suggestions by letting the app know whether you have a car or like to walk, are traveling with kids, on a budget, etc. Slick design too. Nice job - I\'ll look for more smart guides from these guys for sure.
reviews.author: Mike Stone

reviews.title: Very smart and super useful
reviews.comment: I travel quite a lot, and while sometimes I like figuring out all the logistics and details of what I\'m going to do, increasingly I\'d just rather focus on the doing-- and this app helps me do just that.  The interface is super intuitive, and in just a few clicks I can get some information targeted to my interests and logistical requirements-- something that would otherwise take me ages of cross-referencing google maps, yelp and other rating sites, public transportation schedules, and so on.  It just cuts out SO many annoying details that, for someone like me who can get a bit hung up on making the  \"right\" decision, take on the extra burden of stress.  The app is such a relief!!!
reviews.author: Jordan Hill

reviews.title: Great tourist helper!
reviews.comment: This made our trip to San Diego so much more enjoyable!! Thank you Citybot :)
reviews.author: Thomas Jeffrey

reviews.title: Very clever
reviews.comment: Worked well for me and came up with some great recommendations.
reviews.author: Eric Schleicher
